item.title: My design process
item.description: I came across Damien Newmanâ€™s story of the Design Squiggle some time ago. You can read more about it at thedesignsquiggle.com. It has resonated with me since, and prompted me to document my own design process in the last five years collaborating with teams and businesses as a design partner.
